mapper.select: SELECT requested_product_code AS requestedProductCode, date_format(MIN(process_start_date), '%Y-%m-%d %T') AS productionStartDate, date_format(MAX(completed_product_update_date), '%Y-%m-%d %T') AS productionFinishDate FROM product_production_process_status where requested_product_code IN (SELECT requested_product_code AS productCode from product_production_process_status WHERE requested_product_code IN (SELECT requested_product_code AS productCode FROM product_production_process_status GROUP by requested_product_code HAVING MAX(production_process_code) = 'process_07') and production_process_code = 'process_07' AND process_status = '완료') GROUP BY requested_product_code;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO completed_product_list( requested_product_code, production_start_date, production_finish_date, completed_product_reg_date, completed_product_update_date) VALUES ( #{requestedProductCode}, #{productionStartDate}, #{productionFinishDate}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT pss.requested_product_code AS productCode, date_format(pss.production_start_date, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AS startDate, date_format(pss.production_finish_date, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AS finishDate, date_format(rpd.requested_due_date, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AS dueDate, pDetail.gender_categorized_name AS suitType, pDetail.detailed_categorized_name AS productType, rpd.contract_code AS contractCode, cInfo.client_name AS clientName FROM completed_product_list AS pss INNER join requested_product_detail AS rpd on rpd.requested_product_code = pss.requested_product_code INNER join product_code_detail AS pDetail on rpd.product_code = pDetail.product_code INNER join client_info AS cInfo on rpd.client_code = cInfo.client_code
